name: Tesla Effect: A Tex Murphy Adventure

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tesla Effect - A Tex Murphy Adventure/TeslaEffect.exe

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Tesla Effect - A Tex Murphy Adventure/TeslaEffect.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
